mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, ROLE_ID, ORG_ID, EMAIL, PHONE, STATUS, REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, PWD_LAST_CHANGE, OPERATOR, DESENSITIZATION
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from USER_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into USER_INFO (ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, ROLE_ID, ORG_ID, EMAIL, PHONE, STATUS, REMARK, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, PWD_LAST_CHANGE, OPERATOR, DESENSITIZATION ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwdLastChange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desensitization,jdbcType=CHAR} )
